channel.title: AI-Assisted Coding on Sujith Quintelier
channel.description: Recent content in AI-Assisted Coding on Sujith Quintelier

item.title: github: Copilot coding agent can now search the web
item.description:
GitHub’s Copilot coding agent — an asynchronous autonomous background agent that can open draft pull requests and make changes for you — can now search the web to gather information and references to inform its code changes and suggestions.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: dotnet: Prompt Files and Instructions Files Explained
item.description:
A .NET Blog post explaining how GitHub Copilot’s prompt files and instruction files help .NET developers guide and standardize AI-assisted code generation to improve productivity and consistency.

  • Source: .NET
